column2:
"Great job!
Thank you for collecting and bringing
them to me!"

"They are a little too small as I expected,
right...? Maybe it is better to make
some using these as reference!"

"In any case, thank you!
I've other preparations to do so see you
around!"

"おつかれさまっ！
集めてきてくれてありがとう！"

"やっぱりちょっと小さいかなぁ……？
これを見本にして作る方がいいかもっ！"

"なにはともあれありがとうっ！
まだまだ準備はあるからよろしくねっ！"
